scripts.install:dependencies: yarn install && cd client && yarn install && cd ../server && yarn install && cd ../
scripts.remove:dependencies: rm -rf node_modules && cd client && rm -rf node_modules && cd ../server && rm -rf node_modules
scripts.build:all: yarn run build:client && yarn run build:server
scripts.heroku-postbuild: yarn run install:dependencies && yarn run build:all --prod
